definition: doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

pinyin: ming2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

definition: PhD degree (Doctor of Philosophy)/also abbr. to 博士學位|博士学位
pinyin: zhe2 xue2 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4
rong2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

sentences.english: He has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有斯坦福大学计算机科学博士学位。

sentences.english: Yu Kongjian received a doctor degree in Design from Harvard University, the USin 1995.
sentences.chinese: 1995年在美国哈佛大学获设计学博士学位。

sentences.english: Freeland earned his Ph. D. in evolutionary theory at the University of Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 傅利兰在英国剑桥大学取得博士学位，主攻演化理论。

sentences.english: She's presently working on her PhD.
sentences.chinese: 她目前在攻读哲学博士学位。

sentences.english: Courses leading to PhD degrees in librarianship were first introduced in the USA in the early 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 图书资讯学博士学位的课程开始于美国20世纪初。
他在哈佛大学获得博士学位。

sentences.english: This paper discusses how to do novelty searches on line for a PhD dissertation proposal.
sentences.chinese: 文章主要阐述了博士学位论文开题的课题查新。

sentences.english: He has a PhD in history from La Trobe University.
sentences.chinese: 他还荣获拉筹伯大学的历史博士学位。

sentences.english: Dr Wong also has a medical doctorate and is a qualified Anaesthetist .
sentences.chinese: 黄志明博士还拥有医学博士学位并获得了麻醉师资格。

sentences.english: Prof Deng obtained his MA and PhD degrees in Accounting from Xiamen University.
sentences.chinese: 邓教授先后于厦门大学会计系获得其硕士及博士学位。

sentences.english: He obtained a Ph.D. in physics before starting a career in software development.
sentences.chinese: 在开始他的软件开发生涯之前获得了物理学博士学位。

sentences.english: After he got the Doctor's Dearee of Meteorology, he returned to China.
sentences.chinese: 获得气象学博士学位后，竺可桢回国。

sentences.english: He holds 39 patents and 19 honorary doctorates.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有39项专利和19个荣誉博士学位。

sentences.english: In 1991 he graduated and obtained Doctorate Degree in Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 1991年毕业于华中科技大学，获工学博士学位。

sentences.english: Full Professor of the School of Life Sciences, Fudan University, since 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年于日本广岛大学获博士学位。

sentences.english: D. for " juris" or "jurum" doctor, meaning a doctor of law or laws.
sentences.chinese: 未来的律师获得的是法律博士学位。
